mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOSMO_PRODUCT(MNUM, MID, MCNT, MNAME, MPRICE, MDES, MCOM, MIMG, MINSERTDATE, MUPDATEDATE, MDELETEYN) VALUES (#{mnum ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT A.MNUM AS MNUM ,A.MID AS MID ,A.MCNT AS MCNT ,A.MNAME AS MNAME ,A.MPRICE AS MPRICE ,A.MDES AS MDES ,A.MCOM AS MCOM ,A.MIMG AS MIMG ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MINSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MUPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MUPDATEDATE ,A.MDELETEYN AS MDELETEYN FROM KOSMO_PRODUCT A WHERE A.MDELETEYN='Y'

SELECT A.MNUM AS MNUM ,A.MID AS MID ,A.MCNT AS MCNT ,A.MNAME AS MNAME ,A.MPRICE AS MPRICE ,A.MDES AS MDES ,A.MCOM AS MCOM ,A.MIMG AS MIMG ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MINSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MUPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MUPDATEDATE ,A.MDELETEYN AS MDELETEYN FROM KOSMO_PRODUCT A WHERE 1=1
AND A.MNUM LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.MNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
